title: How to Attract an Aquarius-Pisces Cusp Man (11 Flirty Strategies)

steps.title: This zodiac sign might be the most creative of them all.
steps.content: This zodiac sign might be the most creative of them all. Whether he’s into music, painting, filmmaking, or architecture, take time to listen and learn about his craft. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. The Aquarius-Pisces cusp puts his heart and soul into his art, and he’ll value a partner who appreciates his creativity. Ask questions and give heartfelt compliments about his latest project to show that you care. ”Wow, that’s so cool that you made a short film! Can I see it?” ”You really made this scene come to life! Do you only work with oils or do you use other mediums, too?” ”This beat is sick! Have you thought about publishing your music?”

steps.title: He’ll be drawn to someone who can match his intellect.
steps.content: He’ll be drawn to someone who can match his intellect. Got a passion for molecular biology or know a ton of facts about the Jurassic period? Share your knowledge with him to spark a conversation that can last for hours. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. An Aquarius-Pisces cusp loves to learn new things and will enjoy being with someone who can enrich his mind. This sign appreciates transparency, so don't pretend to be into something you actually don't know much about. Instead, be honest about your passions. Are you a huge 80s hair band fan who's memorized the life histories of everyone in Poison, Def Leppard, and Whitesnake? Don't be afraid to tell him that!

steps.title: You’ll stimulate his mind with conversations about the meaning of life.
steps.content: You’ll stimulate his mind with conversations about the meaning of life. This guy is open-minded and will appreciate hearing your views, even if they differ from his own. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Don’t be afraid to play devil’s advocate here—he’ll love examining philosophical and spiritual subjects from every angle. If you're religious, invite him to attend a service with you so he can better understand your faith.

steps.title: The Aquarius-Pisces cusp man is a humanitarian at heart.
steps.content: The Aquarius-Pisces cusp man is a humanitarian at heart. He is full of compassion and cares about people and the planet deeply. Mention causes close to your own heart to show him what a good match you’ll make. [4] X Research source Take it a step further by suggesting you tackle a volunteer project together, whether it’s picking up trash from your city streets or spreading the word about deforestation.

steps.title: He’ll shine in large groups.
steps.content: He’ll shine in large groups. A man with an Aquarius-Pisces cusp sign is bound to be super friendly and social. In addition to one-on-one time, plan some outings with friends to show that you understand his needs and personality. [5] X Research source A pick-up game of soccer, a group trip to an art gallery or concert, or a day at the beach, waterpark, or pool are right up his ally.

steps.title: The Aquarius-Pisces cusp man loves adventures.
steps.content: The Aquarius-Pisces cusp man loves adventures. Plan a spontaneous getaway, schedule a sky-diving excursion, or challenge him to something he’s never tried before. He’ll love having a partner that wants to keep things fun and fresh. It’ll give him a much-needed break from his frequent ponderings on life. Go with the flow when things come up or plans change. This guy adapts to change easily and will appreciate a partner that does the same.

steps.title: This zodiac sign is often referred to as “the Cusp of Sensitivity.”
steps.content: This zodiac sign is often referred to as “the Cusp of Sensitivity.” Don’t be surprised if he reveals that he’s got the weight of the world on his shoulders. He’s very in tune with the feelings of those around him, including you! Encourage him to trust his intuition—it’ll be spot on—and remind him to take time to care for his own needs as well. Let him know you’re there when he needs someone to lean on. Seeing you as his safe haven will make you an invaluable person in his life. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Aquarius-Pisces cusps often feel misunderstood.
steps.content: Aquarius-Pisces cusps often feel misunderstood. Even though your guy loves to be around other people, he might feel isolated if no one in the group really gets him. Take the time to observe him, learn his little quirks, and understand what makes him tick. Then, express that so he knows you’re there for him. “I’m so glad we were a part of that beach clean-up yesterday. I know how much protecting our marine life matters to you.” “That group trip to the museum was so fun, right? I noticed that you seemed really impacted by the Inuit exhibit. What were you thinking when you looked at those artifacts?”

steps.title: This guy wants a partner he can trust.
steps.content: This guy wants a partner he can trust. Be punctual for dates and try to avoid canceling plans at the last minute. Let him know that you have his back and will be there for him—and then follow through. If you want to get serious with this guy, avoid dating anyone else. He’ll want to be the only man in your life. An Aquarius-Pisces man is loyal and committed when he's in a relationship. Show him you are too by saying something like, "I just wanted you to know that I'm not talking to anyone else," or "I deleted Tinder after our first date."

steps.title: Smothering an Aquarius-Pisces cusp will only push him farther away.
steps.content: Smothering an Aquarius-Pisces cusp will only push him farther away. This guy needs time to himself to think and process, and your understanding of that will go a long way. Spend some weekends with your friends or family, and resist the urge to check in often. He’ll reach out when he wants to get together and will appreciate that you have your own social life outside of the relationship. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Make time for your own hobbies and keep up with your social circle. He'll value your independence and all your activities will give you two something to chat about when you see each other again.

steps.title: He’ll take his time to decide if you two are a good match.
steps.content: He’ll take his time to decide if you two are a good match. A man born between the Aquarius and Pisces zodiac is a deep thinker. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. He’ll want to test the waters and analyze your compatibility before deciding to make things official. Rather than pressuring him, give him the time and space to come to his own realization that you two are perfect for each other.
